definitions.definition: A person, animal , plant , or other thing which is from outside the family , group , organization , or territory under consideration.
A citizen or national of another sovereign state.
Any life form of extraterrestrial or extradimensional origin.
One excluded from certain privileges; one alienated or estranged .

main_definition: A person, animal , plant , or other thing which is from outside the family , group , organization , or territory under consideration.
secondary_definitions: A citizen or national of another sovereign state.
( sometimes derogatory ) A mischievous or suspicious foreigner .
Any life form of extraterrestrial or extradimensional origin.
One excluded from certain privileges; one alienated or estranged .
